item.title: Nvim
item.author: Author
item.description: 自动安装vim-plug1 1 2 3 4 5 if empty(glob('~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim')) silent !curl -fLo ~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs \ https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim autocmd VimEnter * PlugInstall --sync | source $MYVIMRC endif Note $MYVIMRC The $MYVIMRC environment variable is set to the file that was first found, unless $MYVIMRC was already set and when using VIMINIT. 基本配置 行相关配置 1 2 3 4 5 6 set number set relativenumber set cursorline set tabstop=2 set shiftwidth=2 set softtabstop=2 Note What is the difference between tabstop, shiftwidth, expandtab, softtabstop?
